definition: the act of cleaning the rooms and furnishings of a house
details:
noun
- the act of cleaning the rooms and furnishings of a house
= example: the act of cleaning the rooms and furnishings of a house
- (figurative) the act of reforming by the removal of unwanted personnel or practices or conditions
= example: (figurative) the act of reforming by the removal of unwanted personnel or practices or conditions
